deprecated_features.title: MT_RAND_PHP mode deprecated
deprecated_features.description: Using MT_RAND_PHP as the second parameter to mt_srand() is deprecated
deprecated_features.replacement: Remove the second parameter or use MT_RAND_MT19937

deprecated_features.title: ReflectionProperty::setValue() with 1 argument
deprecated_features.description: Calling ReflectionProperty::setValue() with only one argument is deprecated

behavior_changes.title: More appropriate Date/Time exceptions
behavior_changes.description: Date/Time extension now throws specific exceptions instead of generic Exception
behavior_changes.recommendation: Update exception handling for Date/Time operations

behavior_changes.title: Negative array indices in unset()
behavior_changes.description: Unsetting negative array indices no longer affects other indices

behavior_changes.title: Iterating over non-countable objects
behavior_changes.description: Calling reset(), end(), next(), prev() on non-arrays now generates warnings
behavior_changes.recommendation: Only use these functions with actual arrays

new_features.title: Typed class constants
new_features.description: Class, interface, trait, and enum constants now support type declarations

new_features.title: #[Override] attribute
new_features.description: New attribute to mark methods that override parent methods

new_features.title: Negative array indices in $$n variables
new_features.description: Negative indices now work correctly with variable variables

new_features.title: json_validate() function
new_features.description: New function to validate JSON without decoding

new_features.title: Randomizer::getBytesFromString() method
new_features.description: New method for generating random strings

new_features.title: Randomizer::getFloat() and nextFloat()
new_features.description: New methods for generating random floats

new_features.title: Command-line argument parsing improvements
new_features.description: Improved support for long option names in CLI

new_features.title: readonly amendments
new_features.description: Readonly properties can now be reinitialized during cloning
